snippet.title: Quiz Nanairo Dreams: Nijiirochō no Kiseki (Capcom, PS1/Saturn, 1996)
snippet.description:
From Wikipedia:
Quiz Nanairo Dreams - Nijiirochō no Kiseki is an arcade game released by Capcom in 1996 on the CPS-2 arcade system board, later being ported to the Sony PlayStation and the Sega Saturn. The game, released in Japan only, puts the player through a series of situations were they must answer various questions to progress.

More:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quiz_Nanairo_Dreams
